nodes.text: Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge Symphonic Overture Suite

The Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge Symphonic Overture Suite was composed by John Williams for the theme park Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. A performance of the symphonic suite by the London Symphony Orchestra with William Ross as conductor was recorded in 2018 at Abbey Road Studios. The musical suite was released in 2019, and received a Grammy award in the "Best Instrumental Composition" category.
